title: Merry, Unquenchable Hobbit (4R311)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, discard him to remove a [Sauron] Orc from a skirmish involving an unbound companion.
Lore:	”'All Wizards should have a hobbit or two in their care - to teach them the meaning of the word, and to correct them.'”
Rarity:	R
